items.sentence: Do you really think that I want to do what I do?
I doubt that I'll feel like doing that tomorrow.
I hope that today's ball game won't be canceled.
Nothing makes me happier than seeing your smile.
Did you tell Tom you didn't know how to do that?
If the price were right, I'd buy three of these.
Mary covered her face to avoid being recognized.
Mary has received several prizes for her poetry.
Mary will buy satin material for her new drapes.
Tom's parents allow him to do anything he wants.
You should've told Tom why he needed to do that.
You should've done that the way Tom told you to.
I'm now at Tom's, helping him with his homework.
I've heard a lot of complaints about that hotel.
The surface of Venus is hot enough to melt lead.
I scratched my head so hard it started bleeding.
We need to know why you think we should do that.
Tom wants his kids to become lawyers or doctors.
Tom wasn't the first to encourage me to do that.
Tom drove me to the airport in his father's car.
Tom has been advised not to go there by himself.
Both defendants claimed that they were innocent.
Did you really believe that was what Tom wanted?
Tom would have a fit if you told him to do that.
I wanted to rent a car, but none were available.
I know we're going to be the last ones to leave.
Tom wondered why Mary's dog kept barking at him.
Tom and Mary both wished they were still single.
Tom and Mary were both pretty busy this morning.
I don't get paid as much as I'd like to be paid.
Besides you, does Tom have any living relatives?
We waited all afternoon for something to happen.
We should've done this the day before yesterday.
Why is it that kids don't want to learn anymore?
Tom burst into a fit of uncontrollable laughter.
I think it would be OK to disobey such an order.
Do you have a pair of sunglasses I could borrow?
Don't let Tom drink more than one glass of wine.
I still drink, but I've cut down on my drinking.
Does boiling water always make it safe to drink?
Tom says that he doesn't want to drink anything.
Even when the economy is bad, people drink beer.
These two pencils are similar, but not the same.
Life is, in the best case, an ocean of problems.
Ask her if she'll sew up the hole in your jeans.
The patient's condition changes from day to day.
Mary made a cake without her mother's knowledge.
Arm in arm, Tom and Mary walked around the pond.
Do you sometimes speak French with your parents?
I wish that we could've stayed in Boston longer.
